hi_IN {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    AmPmMarkers { 
            "\u092A\u0942\u0930\u094D\u0935\u093E\u0939\u094D\u0928",
            "\u0905\u092A\u0930\u093E\u0939\u094D\u0928",
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u0930\u0942",
            "INR ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "\u0930\u0935\u093F ",
            "\u0938\u094B\u092E ",
            "\u092E\u0902\u0917\u0932 ",
            "\u092C\u0941\u0927 ",
            "\u0917\u0941\u0930\u0941 ",
            "\u0936\u0941\u0915\u094D\u0930 ",
            "\u0936\u0928\u093F ",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "\u0930\u0935\u093F\u0935\u093E\u0930 ",
            "\u0938\u094B\u092E\u0935\u093E\u0930 ",
            "\u092E\u0902\u0917\u0932\u0935\u093E\u0930 ",

            "\u0917\u0941\u0930\u0941\u0935\u093E\u0930 ",

            "\u0936\u0928\u093F\u0935\u093E\u0930 ",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Hindi language locale for India" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }

        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Hindi" }
        Territory { "India" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-07-21" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "\u091C\u0928\u0935\u0930\u0940",
            "\u092B\u093C\u0930\u0935\u0930\u0940",
            "\u092E\u093E\u0930\u094D\u091A",
            "\u0905\u092A\u094D\u0930\u0947\u0932",

    }
    MonthNames { 
            "\u091C\u0928\u0935\u0930\u0940",
            "\u092B\u093C\u0930\u0935\u0930\u0940",
            "\u092E\u093E\u0930\u094D\u091A",

        NamePattern { "%p%t%f%t%g" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }

        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }

            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",

    }

    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }

        Units { "mm" }
    }
